column1: The Pit Room////We arrived with 6 people and decided to share the Feast #1
column2: which came with a little bit of everything.  Loads of brisket
column7: pulled pork and BBQ chicken with white bread and our choice of sides; we went with the mac & cheese
column9: and baked beans.  My favorite was definitely the brisket and beef rib
column10: but everything was pretty great.  Even the turkey was incredibly moist and none of the meats disappointed.
